category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 4 (Relationship with other regulations)
contents: Article 4 (Relationship with other regulations) With regard to safety and health management of the Corporation, except for those stipulated in relevant laws such as the Industrial Safety Act, the Disaster and Safety Act, and the Special Act on Safety and Maintenance of Facilities, and the Corporation's collective agreement and employment rules. Follow these regulations. Revised 2021. 12. 22.
